events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident involving a collision at an intersection resulting in visible damage on the front bumper and engine area.
After reviewing the initial claim details, the claim was categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to clear involvement of a vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned to the case to coordinate communication, documentation collection, and to guide the customer through the claims process.
The insurer officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the claimant that evaluation would proceed promptly to facilitate repair arrangements.
The agent requested additional documents from the customer including the police report, valid driverâ€™s license copy, and photos of the vehicle damage.
The policyholder submitted all requested documentation, including the official police report and detailed images of the damaged car parts.
The claims team began an in-depth investigation to verify the circumstances of the accident and assess liability and damage extent.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the claimant was not at fault and the damage valuation aligned with submitted evidence.
A settlement amount covering full repair costs was proposed to the customer with an option for expedited payment processing.
The policyholder expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciated the clarity and responsiveness exhibited by the claims agent.
Final approval of the claim was granted after all conditions were verified and compliance confirmed by the underwriting department.
The agreed settlement payment was disbursed directly to the repair shop as per the preferred payment method authorized by the customer.
The claim file was officially closed after confirmation that all payment processes were complete and the customer confirmed repair completion.
